name: Super Bear Adventure
storyline:
In this world, animals used to live in a community. Bees, bears, turtles, rabbits, were at peace.
The Bee Queen reigned over the kingdom. She was fair and appreciated by all.
This balance was perfect, until the day he arrived...
He kidnapped the queen and impersonated her to quench his thirst for power.
He ordered the bees to make his recipe of Purple Honey and spread it all over the kingdom.
This purple honey caused animals that consumed it to be aggressive and maliceful.
The bees quickly realized that bears were not affected by Purple Honey.
This ability caused their loss: the bees imprisoned the bears in cages in order to avoid any revolts against the queen.
The world needs more than ever a hero.
You, Baaren. You are the only one who can help us!
Find Shicka and go save all the bears trapped by the bees!
The fate of the kingdom rests on your shoulders. You can do it!
summary:
Super Bear Adventure is a 3D platformer game inspired by late 90s games.
Explore 6 open world levels, discover their secrets, talk to the kingdom's inhabitants, collect as many coins as possible, unlock hats, fight your enemies and free your friends!
